creator: Stockring, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Invest with AI-Powered Software
Invest in best stocks and ETFs from 5,000 choices right from your phone or tablet.

No boring reading. No tedious calculations. No problems.
We use technology to save you lots of research time to make investing a pleasure. Daily we prepare exciting lists of stocks and ETFs to buy across dozens of industries and countries. Invest your money in the markets, trade stocks, shares and options with precise guidance and advice from our software.

Invest wisely
StockRing helps you invest in the markets responsibly. Before buying a stock, ETF, or any other investment option, read information on your investment portfolio. Access real-time market data for a specific stock or ETF and get notified about changes.

Endless investment options
No matter what you want to trade, StockRing has it. From Blue Chip stocks to IPOs, to Gold, Silver, Oil ETFs - your chance to invest is now.

Simple and intuitive 
With no complicated interface, signing up for StockRing is easy. StockRing monitors 5,000 stocks and ETFs+ including Dow Jones, Nasdaq, S&P 500 mirror Exchange Traded Funds. Each day you receive fresh Buy-Sell-Hold recommendations for thousands of stocks and ETFs invested in specific industries, commodities, currencies and countries!

Secure and trusted 
User security is top-of-mind. StockRing uses cutting-edge security measures to protect user accounts and personal information.

Disclosure
 Investing with fees means that StockRing, Inc. receives $10/month or $100/year subscription fee on personal StockRing accounts that receive Buy-Sell-Hold recommendations for U.S. listed securities via mobile.

All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security or other financial does not guarantee future results or returns. While diversification may help spread risk, it does not assure a profit or protect against loss. You can always lose money when you invest in securities or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing.

Our Users Say:
- "StockRing app is THE best app to check real-time Stock Market conditions."
- "Great app for active traders who need Buy-Sell-Hold Stock Recommendations." 
- "The fact that I receive Daily BUY and SELL alerts for over 5,700 stocks is just fantastic!!" 

About Us:
 StockRing is a California FinTech startup that created an app that simplifies stock research and portfolio management to just a few seconds a day. That’s right. Our users can open an app, within seconds find all problem stocks in their portfolios, get rid of them, and within seconds find new excellent stocks to replace just sold ones.

How do we do it?
Well, it is incredible! Instead of presenting users with mountains of data, spreadsheets, charts, and other endless crap we show everything in a fun, easy to understand interface where users will immediately spot problems with their stocks. Using StockRing App is as easy as playing a video game for a 5-year-old even though it is a powerful financial tool!

Our AI Engine helps users to find new stocks to buy within seconds for their portfolios. In other words, a user could literally assemble an excellent portfolio out of 20-30 stocks within a minute! And it would be fun too - since users will be just pushing "Plus" or "Minus" buttons almost like playing a video game.

Privacy Policy: https://stockring.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://stockring.com/terms-of-use

title: StockRing IPOs

creator: Stockring, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
IPOs Stocks Investing Scan App makes it easy to search and find great IPOs (Initial Public Offerings) to buy from 700 IPOs available, follow your favorite IPOs, and understand the market. View charts, IPO stock quotes, and daily performance in a personalized watchlist. Tap any IPO ticker to see key fundamentals and technicals, IPO profiles, and business news from top publications around the world. This App updates its Buy and Sell recommendations 3 times a day during the market trading hours. Know when and which IPOs to Buy and Sell and at what price. It is a great tool for Day Traders, Swing trading, Scalping, and Long Term investing with extremely accurate and verifiable recommendations and alerts.

IPO Ratings
• Each IPO receives a Grab (Super Buy), Buy, Hold, Sell, and Dump (Super Sell) rating updated daily.
• View the history of ratings for days, weeks, and months in the past to validate the accuracy of app predictions.
• Filter watchlists to see only IPOs with Grab or Buy ratings to save time and maximize your trading profits.

Watchlist
• Add IPOs with Buy ratings to your watchlist and sort them by daily gains, trading volume, volatility, etc.
• View price quotes, daily trading range, price change in dollars and percentage, net assets.
• Color-coded sparklines allow you effortlessly track IPO performance throughout the day.

Charts and details
• Tap any IPO ticker in any portfolio to see price charts for weeks, months, and multi-year periods.
• Touch the profile, metrics, and history tabs to see the IPO business description, fundamentals, etc.
• View key details including dividends, debt, income, volatility, revenue, earnings dates, EPS, Moving Averages.

Business News
• Read Top Stories automatically selected by app algorithms for the latest news for each IPO.
• Read and watch stories about the IPOs you follow from dozens of business publications, selected using Artificial Intelligence.
• See all beautifully formatted news stories right inside the IPOs Best Top Buy Scanners App that looks great on your Android phone and tablet.

IPOs on all devices
• Use IPOs Stocks Investing Scan App on Google Pixel, Samsung Galaxy S, Galaxy Note, and Galaxy Tab.
• Instantly search 700 IPOs by company name or IPO ticker to find your favorite IPOs.
• Add the most exciting IPOs to your personalized watchlist to quickly look up their daily volume, price range, and gains or losses.

DISCLAIMER

THIS APP IS NOT INTENDED TO BE TRADING OR INVESTING ADVICE. ALWAYS DO YOUR OWN DUE DILIGENCE USING MULTIPLE SOURCES OF INFORMATION AND/OR SEEK THE ADVICE OF A LICENSED PROFESSIONAL BEFORE TRADING OR INVESTING

StockRing, Inc., its officers, directors, and investors do not make any guarantee or other promises as to any results that may be obtained from using this app. No one should make any investment decision without first consulting their own financial advisor and conducting their own research and due diligence.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, StockRing, Inc., its officers, directors, investors, and contractors, disclaims any and all liability in the event any commentary, analysis, information, opinions, advice and/or recommendations prove to be inaccurate, incomplete or unreliable, or result in any investment or other losses.
